name: kickstart-template
title: Kickstart template
description: Kickstart template for my website developments.

scripts.dev: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro dev --host
scripts.build: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro check; npx dotenv-cli -e .env.prod -- astro build; npm run build:cli
scripts.build:local: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro check; npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- astro build; npm run build:cli
scripts.update: npm i @astrojs/check @astrojs/node astro dotenv dotenv-cli typescript
